text: Bishal Bhattarai (born April 4, 1969 in Khotang, Nepal) is a Nepalese politician who now serves as the Nepal Communist Party's Chief Whip (UML). He was elected to the Nepalese House of Representatives representing Khotang. He is also a member of the CPN UML. In 2065 BS, he was elected to the Constituent Assembly for the first time from Khotang-2. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Bishal Bhattarai
